H0.text: What type of creature is Pepé Le Pew. French Rabbit

H1.text: What type of creature is Pepé Le Pew. Opossum

H2.text: What type of creature is Pepé Le Pew. Raccoon

H3.text: What type of creature is Pepé Le Pew. Skunk

A4.text: Depicted as an anthropomorphic French striped skunk, Pepé is constantly in search of love and romance, but his offensive odor typically causes other characters to run away from him.
